languages.text: {n}Шепоты вцепляются в самое болезненное воспоминание словно в оголенный нерв. Насмешки, презрительные взгляды, жалостливые перешептывания — все пережитые следы былого {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}позора{/d} накатывают жгучей волной стыда и сожалений.{/n} "Ты жал{mf|ок|ка}. Ты недосто{mf|ин|йна} вести за собой. Ничтожеству вроде тебя должно сгинуть".

{n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. The ridicule, the looks of contempt, the pitying comments — the long-faded ripples of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} hit you in a burning wave of shame and regret.{/n} "You are pathetic. You do not deserve to lead. An insect like you must perish."
languages.original_text: {n}Шепоты вцепляются в самое болезненное воспоминание словно в оголенный нерв. Насмешки, презрительные взгляды, жалостливые перешептывания — все пережитые следы былого {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}позора{/d} накатывают жгучей волной стыда и сожалений.{/n} "Ты жал{mf|ок|ка}. Ты недосто{mf|ин|йна} вести за собой. Ничтожеству вроде тебя должно сгинуть".

You do not deserve to lead. An insect like you must perish."

languages.text: {n}Das Flüstern bohrt seine Zähne in deine schmerzhafteste Erinnerung, als wäre sie ein freiliegender Nerv. Der Spott, der verächtliche Blick, die mitleidigen Kommentare ... die längst verebbten Wellen deiner {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Schande{/d} treffen dich wie eine brennende Woge der Scham und Reue.{/n} "Ihr seid jämmerlich. Ihr verdient es nicht, zu führen. Ein Insekt wie Ihr muss sterben."
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. The ridicule, the looks of contempt, the pitying comments — the long-faded ripples of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} hit you in a burning wave of shame and regret.{/n} "You are pathetic. You do not deserve to lead. An insect like you must perish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Flüstern bohrt seine Zähne in deine schmerzhafteste Erinnerung, als wäre sie ein freiliegender Nerv. Der Spott, der verächtliche Blick, die mitleidigen Kommentare ... die längst verebbten Wellen deiner {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Schande{/d} treffen dich wie eine brennende Woge der Scham und Reue.{/n} "Ihr seid jämmerlich. Ihr verdient es nicht, zu führen. Ein Insekt wie Ihr muss sterben.

languages.text: {n}Les murmures plantent leurs crocs dans votre souvenir le plus douloureux comme dans un nerf à vif. Le ridicule, le regard méprisant, les remarques pleines de pitié... les échos depuis longtemps disparus de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrâce{/d} vous frappent comme une vague brûlante de honte et de regrets.{/n} « Vous êtes pathétique. Vous ne méritez pas de commander. L'insecte que vous êtes doit périr. »
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. The ridicule, the looks of contempt, the pitying comments — the long-faded ripples of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} hit you in a burning wave of shame and regret.{/n} "You are pathetic. You do not deserve to lead. An insect like you must perish."

Le ridicule, le regard méprisant, les remarques pleines de pitié... les échos depuis longtemps disparus de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrâce{/d} vous frappent comme une vague brûlante de honte et de regrets.{/n} « Vous êtes pathétique. Vous ne méritez pas de commander. L'insecte que vous êtes doit périr. »

languages.text: {n}Los susurros clavan sus colmillos en tu recuerdo más doloroso como si fuera un nervio expuesto. La sorna, las miradas de desprecio, los comentarios lastimeros... ecos de tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}desgracia{/d} te llenan de vergüenza y arrepentimiento.{/n} «Eres patétic{mf|o|a}. No mereces ser líder. Un insecto como tú debe morir».
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. The ridicule, the looks of contempt, the pitying comments — the long-faded ripples of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} hit you in a burning wave of shame and regret.{/n} "You are pathetic. You do not deserve to lead. An insect like you must perish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los susurros clavan sus colmillos en tu recuerdo más doloroso como si fuera un nervio expuesto. La sorna, las miradas de desprecio, los comentarios lastimeros... ecos de tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}desgracia{/d} te llenan de vergüenza y arrepentimiento.{/n} «Eres patétic{mf|o|a}. No mereces ser líder. Un insecto como tú debe morir».

languages.text: {n}その囁きは、むき出しの神経だけでなくあなたの一番つらい記憶に牙を食い込ませる。嘲笑、軽蔑のまなざし、憐みの言葉…{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}恥辱{/d}の波紋は消えゆくことなく、羞恥心と公開の炎となってあなたを襲う。{/n}「哀れね。指導者にふさわしくない。あなたのような虫は滅びてしまえばいい」
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. The ridicule, the looks of contempt, the pitying comments — the long-faded ripples of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} hit you in a burning wave of shame and regret.{/n} "You are pathetic. You do not deserve to lead. An insect like you must perish."

traits.locale_text: {n}その囁きは、むき出しの神経だけでなくあなたの一番つらい記憶に牙を食い込ませる。嘲笑、軽蔑のまなざし、憐みの言葉…{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}恥辱{/d}の波紋は消えゆくことなく、羞恥心と公開の炎となってあなたを襲う。{/n}「哀れね。指導者にふさわしくない。あなたのような虫は滅びてしまえばいい」

languages.text: {n}那些窃窃私语的声音将毒牙刺入你最痛苦的记忆之中，仿佛在啮咬着暴露在外的神经一样。那些嘲笑的声音、轻蔑的目光、怜悯的言语，你以为{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}耻辱{/d}的涟漪早已散去，但它此刻正在你的羞愧与悔恨之中熊熊燃烧。{/n}“你真可悲。你不配成为领袖，像你这样的蛆虫只配去死。”
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. The ridicule, the looks of contempt, the pitying comments — the long-faded ripples of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} hit you in a burning wave of shame and regret.{/n} "You are pathetic. You do not deserve to lead. An insect like you must perish."

traits.locale_text: {n}那些窃窃私语的声音将毒牙刺入你最痛苦的记忆之中，仿佛在啮咬着暴露在外的神经一样。那些嘲笑的声音、轻蔑的目光、怜悯的言语，你以为{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}耻辱{/d}的涟漪早已散去，但它此刻正在你的羞愧与悔恨之中熊熊燃烧。{/n}“你真可悲。你不配成为领袖，像你这样的蛆虫只配去死。”

languages.text: {n}Fısıltılar, dişlerini açıktaki bir sinire batırır gibi en acı hatıralarına saplıyor. Alaylar, küçümseyici bakışlar, acıyıcı yorumlar... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Rezilliğinin{/d} uzun zaman önce solmuş suları, yakıcı bir utanç ve pişmanlık dalgasıyla seni vuruyor.{/n} "Zavallısın. Önderlik makamını hak etmiyorsun. Senin gibi bir böcek, yok olup gitmeli."
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. The ridicule, the looks of contempt, the pitying comments — the long-faded ripples of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}disgrace{/d} hit you in a burning wave of shame and regret.{/n} "You are pathetic. You do not deserve to lead. An insect like you must perish."
